short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate and manage color palettes for UI/UX design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows users to create custom color palettes and generate various shades for each color. Users can define a base color and automatically generate a series of shades, ranging from lighter to darker tones. Each palette is customizable with a name and can be saved locally, making it easy to manage multiple color collections.
